resources.string: So you can set up this alarm 1. Connect the charger to the outlet from which you usually charge the phone 2. Connect the charger cable to the phone 3. Clicking "Let's rest" 4. Enjoy a restful sleep 5. The app will wake you up when the power comes on
This application will come in handy when you have no electricity at home and you want to sleep and wait for it to connect
